solution_line_template: Since Kenneth spent {spent_percent}%, then he is left with {total_percent}% - {spent_percent}% = {remaining_percent}% of his earnings.

Since {remaining_percent}% of his earnings is worth ${remaining_amount}, then 1% of his earnings is ${remaining_amount}/{remaining_percent} = $<<{remaining_amount}/{remaining_percent}={one_percent_value}>>{one_percent_value}.
